public class Hand
extends CardList

Author:
Gerald Lang 260402748 Additional services to manage a card list that corresponds to the cards in a player's hand.

canLead

public CardList canLead(boolean pNoTrump)
Parameters:
pNoTrump - If the contract is in no-trump
Returns:
A list of cards that can be used to lead a trick.

getJokers

Returns:
The cards that are jokers.

getNonJokers

The cards that are not jokers.

getTrumpCards

public CardList getTrumpCards(Card.Suit pTrump)
Returns all the trump cards in the hand, including jokers. Takes jack swaps into account.

Parameters:
pTrump - The trump to check for. Cannot be null.
Returns:
All the trump cards and jokers.
Precondition:
pTrump != null

getNonTrumpCards

public CardList getNonTrumpCards(Card.Suit pTrump)
Returns all the cards in the hand that are not trumps or jokers. Takes jack swaps into account.

Parameters:
pTrump - The trump to check for. Cannot be null.
Returns:
All the cards in the hand that are not trump cards.
Precondition:
pTrump != null

selectLowest

public Card selectLowest(Card.Suit pTrump)
Selects the least valuable card in the hand, if pTrump is the trump.

Parameters:
pTrump - The trump suit. Can be null to indicate no-trump.
Returns:
The least valuable card in the hand.

playableCards

public CardList playableCards(Card.Suit pLed,
                              Card.Suit pTrump)
Parameters:
pLed - The suit led.
pTrump - Can be null for no-trump
Returns:
All cards that can legally be played given a lead and a trump.

numberOfCards

public int numberOfCards(Card.Suit pSuit,
                         Card.Suit pTrump)
Returns the number of cards of a certain suit in the hand, taking jack swaps into account. Excludes jokers.

Parameters:
pSuit - Cannot be null.
pTrump - Cannot be null.
Returns:
pSuit Can be null.
